messages.content: Anything intelligent to say, sometime maybe perhaps?
Just curious, how many supplies did you take?
What was the end result of this?
Can we all pitch in and buy this place instead of the Baltimore House?
Shotgun! But do I get to play with all the buttons too?
What made you so interested in great whites?
Ironically every /pol/ meetup is more diverse than the people pushing diversity and race mixing. Weird how that works huh
What kind of insider only has 250 followers?
That's interesting. Have you used it to register on many sites/services?
LSD or the fungal kind? Out of curiosity
So where are all these [NAME] lining up to be landscapers and farmhands for minimum wage?
Old timbermill. Was that the long payload defense and attack?
And how long ago was this?
he's still alive?? didn't he die?
Should I watch this? Will it aggravate me?
Does anyone know how much the skin is supposed to cost? Edit: And does it put the lotion on it's skin?
So kinda like an assistant? Interesting
I want to know how she thinks you can convert fat into muscle
Now I'm wondering if [NAME] drinks, and if he's ever been inebriated during one of his deals.
Have nobody thought of the giant tech corporation selling overpriced, inferior products to sheep customers? That's odd.
Could you explain what you mean by "both sides" crap?
What's your source for that? Just curious (and yes I know it sounds like a tired contrarian statement).
Why are you trying to do that? What’s going on?
I've been really into reading nonfiction lately and ancient religious history sounds fascinating! Do you have any books you recommend?
I’m curious what is their concern and their purpose to be plus-size people influencers regarding the fact that they do not belong to that group?
Would you like a friend? I sure could use one.
Really? How would they know what pharmacy you want to visit?
With [NAME] and [NAME] back, and [NAME] waiting in the wings, would you still want an EDGE in round 1?
Is the use of stone that common for the medical field in the UK?
